unnormalised: Hey! Ayurveda is trending! My grandma swears by it. Remember her joint pain? All gone after that Kottakkal treatment in Kerala. Heard their Panchakarma is amazing! Planning to try it next Onam. Maybe after a heavy biryani binge, lol. Anyone tried any good clinics around Bangalore? Rs. 5000 a day sounds reasonable? What about traveling 200 km for a good one?
